Interface Serializer<T>

All Known Subinterfaces:

All Known Implementing Classes:
BaseSerializer, BeanSerializer, CollectionSerializer, EnumSerializer, MapSerializer, PrimitiveSerializer, StaticBeanSerializer, StaticCollectionSerializer, StaticMapSerializer
public interface Serializer<T>
extends SerializationSupport<T>

This class serializes a specific bean.

serialize
 

Method Detail

isComplex

boolean isComplex()
Returns:
true if the serialization must be done in two steps, false otherwise.

getIdentifier

Identifier getIdentifier(SerializationContext context,
                         T object,
                         java.lang.annotation.Annotation[] annotations,
                         TripleSet buffer)
Returns the identifier of the serialized object before performing the serialization itself.

Parameters:
context - context used to serialize the T object.
object - target object.
annotations - annotations associated to the object.
buffer - triple set buffer used to store triples representing the serialization result.
Returns:
the identifier of the serialization.
